extendedInfo.description: This is fastest function(Apps, Shortcut, open/close Notification, etc.) launcher.You can do most operations by moving your thumb slightly.1. By touching Hotspot (the gesture area that are always visible on the screen), you can call the functions corresponding to the gesture. (If your device is Rooted, you can also issue a hard button events)2. By registering apps to Launcher, you will be able to start them at any time quickly.Gestures that can be registered in Hotspot-> Left, Right, Up, Down scroll-> Single-tap-> Long-press-> Double-tapFunction that can be registered in each gesture.-> Open Launcher-> Application, Shortcut-> Open/Close Notification-> Go to Home app-> Hide Hotspot-> Back, Menu, Search, Power key (only ROOT user)-> etc.Functions that can be registered in Launcher-> App-> Shortcut-> Widget-> Recent Apps** From developer **I'm glad if you please, such as blog / review / tweet. (You need not take consent to the developer)

reviews.title: battery drains..
reviews.comment: why the battery discharging swiftly though the mobile is standby alone..before installing this I didn\'t have this issue..other than that app is awesome
reviews.author: reviwz my

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: It looks really great app .. but the think is im not sure how to use it. I still dont understand the description. Please help out.
reviews.author: Arkshay Calvin

reviews.title: Still the best in class, best implentation.
reviews.comment: I tried all the other apps. Only this one works flawless technically and intuitive ui. Able to launch widgets and even resize the widget!! Great job dev. Will get the paid version.
reviews.author: Bryan Chance

reviews.title: By far the best app of its kind
reviews.comment: Blows away wave, sidebar, dock4droid, and swipepad. Tons of customizable options, supports widgets and free! Good job Dev. Just a thought, maybe future updates could incorporate the use of the home button swipe up feature...as hotspots on bottom of the screen are hard to use because Google now keeps opening.
reviews.author: Steven Salcedo

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: Update: seems to be some excessive battery drain, please fix..... This has so many features and customization! Provides access to apps, widgets, recent apps, search function, themeable. List goes on. I have tried them all. This is the best. You need to set down and olay with the set up to learn just how much it does, but it\'s worth it. This dev has put A LOT of work in this. Thanks.
reviews.author: Paul Johnson

reviews.title: The best I\'ve used
reviews.comment: I uninstalled unity launcher pro after using this for 5mins,great job
reviews.author: James Mullins

reviews.title: Very good app
reviews.comment: Only direct call does not work (galaxy s4)

reviews.comment: Very Cool

reviews.comment: Doesnt stay open Battery hog

reviews.comment: Excellent and smart!

reviews.title: The best of its kind !
reviews.comment: Works great on both tablets and phones.  This one has the best combination of functions and they all work perfectly.

reviews.comment: very useful!

reviews.comment: So far working better than pie controls in my opinion.
reviews.author: Brad Souness

reviews.title: Gt-n7100
reviews.comment: Like swapp but a lot more feature

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Neat and clear no frills, thanks to developer for his work
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: So far so perfect
reviews.comment: I have been trying a whole bunch of overlay style launchers in order to quickly swipe and switch around the apps i am using all day. This one is stable, fast, accurate and highly configurable. On a Note2 with the big screen it now allows me to open/close my notifications with a swipe on the bottom right, open recent apps, apps i configured to launch (the ones i use the most) and go to my lightning launch home screen (set up like a dashboard of information - calls, emails, calendar). Definitely perfect for everyone who wants to handle their phone as fast as possible. Highly recommended.
reviews.author: Stefan Lafloer

reviews.title: DESERVING OF ALL STARS ... BUT
reviews.comment: DOES NOT START service AUTOMATICALLY when rebooting -- instead you have to manually restart the app yourself.
reviews.author: jose serrano

reviews.title: Best multitasking app!
reviews.comment: Utilizes minimal resources. Fastest, most configurable free launcher panel overlay app thus far!(swapps, sidebar, swipepad) Although it is the fastest out there, please strive to make the app even faster.
reviews.author: Don Nguyen

reviews.title: **Wishlist**
reviews.comment: Awesome, this replaced two apps. Please add hide /exclude apps from recent /running apps. Android had too many launchers. This adds gestures, I. E. WebOS!!!
reviews.author: Michael Tanner
